text: 10:15 1 Atriviba 11:24-39Fomɨra akam inigha izir gumazim Ahiya, a Silon gumazim, a Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn akar dɨkɨrɨzim Nebatɨn otarim Jeroboam ganɨngi. Egha God datɨrɨghɨn uan akar dɨkɨrɨzir kam damutɨ, a guizɨn otivasava ami. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Ikiavɨra Itir God uabɨ Rehoboam gamizɨ, a gumazamizibar nɨghnɨzimɨn gɨn zuir puvatɨ.
